thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com | 3 of 105
thread.title: Ken Vonhoff

author: Ken Vonhoff
title: Ken Vonhoff
text:
OFX provide an excellent online service. The system is easy to use and works well. However, if you need to talk to someone there is always someone with experience and good knowledge to answer your questions.
You can find slightly better rates with another company. But I am more than happy to deal with an Australian company for the sake of $2 or $3. Yes only a few dollars difference with overseas companies.
